tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Visualization (
  visualization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visualization_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  visualization_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dashboard_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (dashboard_id) REFERENCES Dashboard(dashboard_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metric_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  visualization_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (visualization_id) REFERENCES Visualization(visualization_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dashboard_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE visualization_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    chart_type VARCHAR(50),
    visualization_src TEXT,
    data_source_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE business_entities (
    entity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_name VARCHAR(255),
    business_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Visualization (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    data_source_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE BusinessMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date DATE,
    time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE UserRoles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(id)
);
